title: Teleport lag
body:
I am playing league of legends on Macbook that has window version on it, which i been playing for a few months and everything was fine FPS was great and someday i just got teleport lag appear inside the game my ping and my fps stays the same and my champion just can't move anywhere to where i wanted him to go for at least 2-4 seconds and it just teleported to where your cursor is which made my game so hard!

any thoughts and help please give me!
i also tried repair the LoL
I turned off movement predictions 
but still it is happening again and again..

replies.body:
Hey,

It sounds like you are seeing a bit of packet loss on your connection to the game servers.   First up I'd suggest you check out the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support page for a checklist of things to try to fix the issue

Cheers
Mindstar
